original_title: Yes: Songs From Tsongas - 35th Anniversary Concert
overview: Songs from Tsongas is a live video and album by the English rock band Yes, released on DVD in 2005 and CD and Blu-ray in 2014 by Image Entertainment. It was recorded at the Tsongas Arena in Lowell, Massachusetts on 15 May 2004 during the band's 2004 tour in celebration of their 35th anniversary. It is the band's last live album to feature original singer Jon Anderson.
title: Yes: Songs From Tsongas - 35th Anniversary Concert
